markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Clockwork Disposer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1947)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wealthy business owners sometimes employ clockwork disposers to pick up trash around their establishment and keep the place tidy. Many are designed with handy (but dangerous) built-in furnaces, which they use to quickly incinerate collected refuse.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Clockwork Disposer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1947)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Wind-Up** 24 hours, DC 20, standby

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 70

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
physical 5 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=372) or orichalcum)

**Weaknesses**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
gripper +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spike +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+4 piercing

**Furnace Belch** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The clockwork disposer coughs up a cloud of hot ash and embers that deals 6d6 fire damage in a 15-foot cone (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The clockwork disposer can't use Furnace Belch again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-223" />
name: Clockwork Disposer

text: Clockwork Disposer Wealthy business owners sometimes employ clockwork disposers to pick up trash around their establishment and keep the place tidy. Many are designed with handy (but dangerous) built-in furnaces, which they use to quickly incinerate collected refuse. Recall Knowledge - Construct (Arcana, Crafting): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Clockwork Disposer Source Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz pg. 80 Perception +13; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +12, Stealth +12 Str +2 Dex +4 Con +1 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha -5 Wind-Up 24 hours, DC 20, standby --- AC 21 Fort +12 Ref +15 Will +9 HP 70 Immunities death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poisoned, sickened, unconscious Resistances physical 5 (except adamantine or orichalcum) Weaknesses electricity 5, orichalcum 5 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action gripper +15 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 2d8+4 bludgeoning Melee Single Action spike +15 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 2d8+4 piercing Furnace Belch Two Actions (Fire) The clockwork disposer coughs up a cloud of hot ash and embers that deals 6d6 fire damage in a 15-foot cone (DC 22 basic Reflex save). The clockwork disposer can't use Furnace Belch again for 1d4 rounds.
